item.title: zer0pts CTF 2023 - GitFile Explorer
item.description: This is a single PHP file challenge that contains a “Git File Explorer”, it basically fetches a file from github/gitlab/bitbucket that you specify in the form. The challenge here is to read /flag at the root. I went through the code to see how we can possibly read the flag, and the only way it seem to be out of this snippet: if ($service) { $url = craft_url($service, $owner, $repo, $branch, $file); if (preg_match("/^http.
